description: Adds to or modifies the tags of the given resource. Tags are metadata that can be used to manage a resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to which you want to add or update tags.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags you want to modify or add to the resource. (dict) --- A tag is a key-value pair that is used to manage the resource. This tag is available for use by Amazon Web Services services that support tags. The tag's key. The tag's value.
